name: Gray Orc
movement: climb 30 ft., walk 40 ft., burrow 20 ft.
description: Gray Orcs have pale skin decorated with swirls of black resin, enhancing their ability to blend into their dark surroundings.
memorable: Their unique 'Magic Absorption' ability allows them to regain hit points from spells, making them tough adversaries against spellcasters.
goals: Gray Orcs typically seek to ambush prey and survive in darkness, using their stealth and agility to hunt successfully.
relations: They are typically encountered in groups, often working alongside other orcs or predatory creatures.
environment: Gray Orcs thrive in dark, subterranean environments where their stealth can be fully utilized.
strengths: High stealth and agility, combined with abilities that enhance their combat efficacy in groups.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity makes them less effective during the day, imposing penalties to attacks and perception.
attacks: They use their claws to deal slashing damage with agile melee strikes.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Magic Absorption' trait allows them to recover hit points when affected by spells.
senses: They have blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing them to sense creatures without sight in darkness.
skills: Skilled in stealth and acrobatics, reflecting their capabilities in ambush and mobility.
additional_information: Known to paint their skin with symbols of their gods for success in hunting.
Can engage enemies aggressively as a bonus action.
Advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby, enhancing their pack tactics.
Good constitution and dexterity make them hard to take down quickly.
They often employ ambush tactics to surprise their enemies.
test_queries: orc that can absorb magic damage
